description: This is a Flutter application main file, setting up the app's entry point, theme, and main UI scaffold with an AppBar and placeholder content.

classes.name: MyApp
classes.description: Root widget configuring the application theme and initial home page.

classes.name: MyHomePage
classes.description: Stateful widget representing the main page with a title.

classes.name: _MyHomePageState
classes.description: State class managing the UI state of MyHomePage, constructs scaffold with app bar and placeholder content.

methods.name: main
methods.description: Application entry point; initializes and runs the Flutter app.

methods.name: build
methods.description: Builds the widget tree for MyApp and _MyHomePageState, constructing the UI.

methods.name: createState
methods.description: Creates the mutable state for MyHomePage.
